meanings.definition: Go before in place or time.
meanings.sent1: She forewent her sister to the park.
meanings.sent2: He always forewent his friends to the movies.
meanings.sent3: The cat forewent the dog to the food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The early bird forewent the other birds to the worm.
meanings.sent5: The diligent student forewent distractions to focus on studying.

meanings.sent1: The forewent event was a success.
meanings.sent4: The forewent season was full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The forewent class was engaging and informative.
